acceptance_criteria: AC-3: Form has username, email, password, confirmPassword fields + submit
AC-6: Invalid email shows inline validation error
AC-9: Weak password shows strength requirements (min 8 chars, uppercase, lowercase, number)
content.implementation_summary: Added Zod validation schema with React Hook Form. Schema validates: username (3+ chars), email (valid format), password (8+ chars with uppercase/lowercase/number), confirmPassword (must match). All validation integrated with existing registration form.
content.validation_method: Manual form testing - try invalid inputs and verify error messages
